alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 12:17AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Carbon and southwestern Albany Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1217 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from North Fork Campground to 10 miles north of Four Corners. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hutton Lake around 1245 AM MDT. The Buttes, Tie Siding and Pumpkin Vine around 100 AM MDT. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 274 and 305. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range
